item.title: 1 Error, need some help
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote=“slim_2021, post:12, topic:169251”]NPCHandler.java:628: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable npcType
location: class NPC[]
if (npcs.npcType == 0) {
^
NPCHandler.java:630: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable updateRequired
location: class NPC[]
npcs.updateRequired = true;
^
NPCHandler.java:631: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable textUpdateRequired
location: class NPC[]
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
^
NPCHandler.java:634: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable textUpdate
location: class NPC[]
npcs.textUpdate = “Owner Your Father is online!”;
^
NPCHandler.java:638: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable textUpdate
location: class NPC[]
npcs.textUpdate = “Owner Your Father is offline!”;
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
5 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

well, theres the errors.[/quote]

Ok, so in whatever class you’re updating…In this case, I take it NPChandler? Idk since I use a diff source. (My own from scratch)

Anyway, hit Ctrl + G not F but g, and see the… NPCHandler.java:628 on your compiler when you compile?

Type in 628 in it, like in the: NPCHandler.java:628 <Like that, only just type 628.

It should take you to the line you messed up on. Try using a tut?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2007, 08:02:11 PM[/size][hr]Also, do that to every error you find. I suggest deleting what you did, and starting over.

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Error, need some help
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Replace it with this:

if (npcs.npcType == 0) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs.updateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("your father")) { npcs.textUpdate = "Owner Your Father is online!"; } else { npcs.textUpdate = "Owner Your Father is offline!"; } } }

You had one too many open brackets and one to short closing. Making the boolean below it illegal

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Error, need some help
item.dc:creator: @slim_2021 slim_2021
item.description:
@slim_2021 wrote:

Ok well im trying to make hans say that im online or offline, but it gives me 1 error when i compile, this is the error…

NPCHandler.java:980: illegal start of expression
public static boolean IsDropping = false;
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

this is what i have it set on for hans in my NPC Handler

if (npcs[i].npcType == 0) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“your father”))
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner Your Father is online!”;
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner Your Father is offline!”;
}
}

Read full topic
